# Readiness Artifacts Index

**Status:** To be generated by readiness_gate.py

This document will be automatically populated when the Readiness Gate runs.

## Overview

The Readiness Gate produces the following artifacts:

### Reports
- `readiness_report.json` - Machine-readable gate results
- `READINESS_REPORT_1_25.md` - Human-readable summary report

### Test Artifacts
- `coverage.xml` - Code coverage report (XML format)
- `htmlcov/` - HTML coverage report
- `junit.xml` - Test results in JUnit format

### Configuration
- `smoke_matrix.yml` - Smoke test scenarios for all agents
- `grep_rules.yml` - Pattern enforcement rules
- `stepwise_matrix.csv` - Deliverables checklist for Steps 1-25

## Usage

Run the Readiness Gate:

```powershell
# Windows
python src\qnwis\scripts\qa\readiness_gate.py

# Or via pytest
pytest tests\system\test_readiness_gate.py -v
```

## Artifact Checksums

Checksums will be populated after gate execution.
